CustomField.formula: MID( HRCSVC_URL__c, IF( CONTAINS(HRCSVC_URL__c, "www."), FIND("www.", HRCSVC_URL__c) + 4, IF( CONTAINS(HRCSVC_URL__c, "://"), FIND("://", HRCSVC_URL__c) + 3, 0 ) ), LEN(HRCSVC_URL__c) - IF( CONTAINS(HRCSVC_URL__c, "www."), FIND("www.", HRCSVC_URL__c) + 3, IF( CONTAINS(HRCSVC_URL__c, "://"), FIND("://", HRCSVC_URL__c) + 2, 0 ) ) - IF(RIGHT(HRCSVC_URL__c, 1) = "/", 1, 0) )
CustomField.label: Trimmed URL
